<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
LABOR
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/08/amazon-leads-union-21-half-votes-counted?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
At Halftime, Amazon Up Big on Union
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/08/amazon-leads-union-21-half-votes-counted" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="BESSEMER, AL - MARCH 28: An Amazon-sponsored billboard urging employees ..." style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80NjcxL3VuaW9uX3B1c2hfYXRfYW1hem9uX3dhcmUuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Elijah Nouvelage/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">As execs at Sears and Barnes & Noble can tell you, it’s virtually impossible to beat Amazon—and organizers trying to form the company’s first union at a US facility are finding that out. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">With <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-04-08/amazon-union-vote-count-expected-to-start-as-early-as-thursday?sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">about half</a> the ballots remaining in the closely watched union vote, 1,100 “no”s had been counted compared to 463 “yes”es. Officials stopped counting around 7pm ET last night and will finish today.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Roughly 55% of the 5,805 eligible voters cast ballots.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>To win, the union needs more than half of the votes. </span></li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">The backstory</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">As demand for e-commerce skyrocketed during the pandemic, some employees at an Amazon facility in Bessemer, AL, grew fed up with working conditions, and <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/07/amazon-faces-big-union-test-alabama-warehouse?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">started an effort</a> to join the Retail, Wholesale, and Department Store Union (RWDSU). Some of their specific complaints included:</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Lack of communication between managers and staff; specifically, how disciplinary action is carried out not by people...but by app. </span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Punishments for workers’ failure to maintain six feet of distance, even when there was not enough space for them to do so.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The odds were against organizers from the beginning. Amazon has successfully squashed all unionization attempts in the US so far, and the company applied super aggressive tactics to make sure it didn’t happen in Alabama. Labor organizing across the tech industry has typically been unsuccessful. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Organizers did have some <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/03/02/business/amazon-union-bessemer-alabama.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">friends in high places</a>. Democrats including President Biden and Sen. Bernie Sanders voiced support, and so did some Republicans, like Sen. Marco Rubio. NFL players and actors took up the cause as a civil rights issue, since most of the workers at the Bessemer facility are Black.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">It may not end today</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Union leaders signaled they’d appeal the vote, citing documents that showed Amazon <a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/technology/2021/04/08/amazon-bessemer-mailbox-union/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">pressured</a> the Postal Service to install a mailbox right outside the facility, which may have intimidated workers when they cast their vote. “We will be calling on the labor board to hold Amazon accountable for its illegal and egregious behavior during the campaign,” said RWDSU President Stuart Appelbaum. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>a legal battle could push off a conclusive result for weeks. But for now, it appears as though Amazon may have dodged a labor organizing threat that would have rippled across the e-commerce industry. </p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
REGULATION
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/08/biden-announces-executive-actions-gun-control?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Biden Enters the Gun Control Chat
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/08/biden-announces-executive-actions-gun-control" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="WASHINGTON, DC - APRIL 08: U.S. President Joe Biden speaks  during an ev..." style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80NjcwL3ByZXNpZGVudF9iaWRlbl9kZWxpdmVycy5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Alex Wong/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Calling gun violence in the US an "epidemic" and an "international embarrassment," President Biden yesterday outlined a <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-biden-guns/president-biden-announces-steps-to-limit-ghost-guns-plans-to-tackle-assault-weapons-idUSKBN2BV2F2?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">few steps</a> aimed at tackling the problem. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Crack down on "ghost guns," or guns that come in kits and can evade law enforcement because they don't have serial numbers.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Subject firearms that utilize stabilizing braces, which effectively turn pistols into short-barreled rifles, to more regulation.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Direct the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms, and Explosives to release an annual report on firearms trafficking.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But as executive orders, not actual laws, these moves are more a tremor than an earthquake. Biden would like to see far more gun control legislation, including a ban on assault weapons and the <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/04/08/biden-calls-for-allowing-lawsuits-against-gun-makers-for-shootings.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">lifting</a> of legal immunity for firearms manufacturers, but he won't get very far without support from Republicans in Congress...which he doesn't have. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>Biden wants to prioritize the Covid-19 response and his infrastructure bill, but gun control has re-emerged as a policy focus following mass shootings in Atlanta, Boulder, and, most recently, Rock Hill, SC.</p>

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
TRAVEL
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/08/cdc-cruise-lines-spar-reopening?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
The CDC Hasn't Forgotten the Diamond Princess
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/08/cdc-cruise-lines-spar-reopening" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Cruise line" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC84MjkvY3J1aXNlX2xpbmUuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The last week had more twists and turns for cruise operators than Carnival's Dr. Suess waterslide. On Friday, the CDC released new guidelines to resume passenger operations...but stopped short of a date. Following industry outcry, it relented and said maybe mid-summer. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Cruises still feel put out.</strong> Having watched flight and hotel bookings soar in recent months, cruise lines <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/cruise-industry-spars-with-cdc-as-it-seeks-to-restart-by-summer-11617813616?mod=business_lead_pos2&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">want the same treatment</a> as other travel sectors (the CDC <em>did</em> say travel is low-risk for fully vaccinated people). </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Royal Caribbean, Carnival, Disney, and Norwegian have had to <a href="https://thepointsguy.com/news/royal-caribbean-celebrity-cruise-cancellations-june/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">cancel trips</a> through June, and yesterday, Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis announced he's suing the federal government to let passengers aboard. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But to bring customers back, per CDC rules, cruise lines will have to... </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Run simulated voyages to rehearse safety procedures.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Recommend vaccinations for everyone. Norwegian, the first major US cruise line to publish reopening plans, </span><span><a href="https://www.cnn.com/2021/04/06/business/norwegian-cruise-line-resumption-plans-cdc/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">said</a></span><span> it will </span><span><em>require</em></span><span> them. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out:</strong> Several operators have resumed sailings out of the Caribbean and the Mediterranean, but following a year of standstills, they're desperate to get more ships out to sea. Carnival, Norwegian, and Royal Caribbean lost almost $7 billion last year.</p>

<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Stat: </strong>81% of Americans use YouTube, making it the most popular online platform by a wide margin, according to a new <a href="https://www.pewresearch.org/internet/2021/04/07/social-media-use-in-2021/?utm_campaign=[covid19]+Tech+Impac&utm_content=565984&utm_medium=email&utm_source=cio&utm_term=197772&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Pew survey</a>. Facebook is second with 69%, followed by Instagram (40%), Pinterest (31%), and LinkedIn (28%).</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Quote: </strong>"Even though I'm a pro-crypto, pro-bitcoin maximalist person, I do wonder whether if at this point bitcoin should also be thought of in part as a Chinese financial weapon against the US."</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">At a virtual roundtable Wednesday, billionaire investor and crypto bull Peter Thiel said he considers bitcoin a <a href="https://www.coindesk.com/paypal-co-founder-bitcoin-investor-thiel-says-bitcoin-could-be-chinese-weapon?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">potential threat</a> to the supremacy of the US dollar. He suggested that the US government should think more about regulating cryptocurrencies to prevent currency warfare. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Read: </strong>A Q&A with the man who keeps uploading my feet to WikiFeet. (<a href="https://www.thecut.com/2021/04/a-q-and-a-with-the-man-who-keeps-uploading-my-feet-to-wikifeet.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">The Cut</a>)</p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
LUXURY
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/08/luxury-brands-see-sales-boom-despite-pandemic?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
I Mean It’s One Rolls-Royce Michael, What Could it Cost? $10?
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/08/luxury-brands-see-sales-boom-despite-pandemic" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Four bars of gold with Rolls-Royce logo on one" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80NjY3L3JvbGxzX3JveWNlX2dvbGQuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em><em>Francis Scialabba</em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Rolls-Royce, luxury car brand and Daisy Buchanan's murder weapon of choice, just had its best quarter since it was founded in 1906. The company delivered 1,380 cars in Q1 2021, increasing sales by 62% over last year. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Big picture: </strong>While we debated if $60 sweatpants were worth it, the megarich were doing…sort of the same thing, but with more zeros. Other luxury brands have also reported booms in the last year:</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Bentley's CEO </span><span><a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-03-24/the-pandemic-is-creating-a-postwar-boom-for-luxury-carmakers?sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">said</a></span><span> the auto brand started 2021 with 50% more orders than it started 2020 with, and that it would take "an even bigger asteroid than the Covid one to knock us off track again."</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>High-end appliance and furniture sellers (think $20k Wolf ranges and $6k coffee tables) reported an </span><span><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/04/08/style/home-design-curtains-up-for-the-one-percent.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">explosion of business</a></span><span> that has led to supply chain bottlenecks.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out:</strong> Even in a year of economic struggle for many, there are <a href="https://www.forbes.com/sites/kerryadolan/2021/04/06/forbes-35th-annual-worlds-billionaires-list-facts-and-figures-2021/?sh=5571d2fc5e58&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">660 more billionaires</a> than there were a year ago. And 86% of billionaires got richer over the last year, making the total wealth of all billionaires in the world jump $5 trillion, according to Forbes's annual list of people least likely to know what a Baja Blast is.</p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>Treat your taxes like you treat getting a vaccine appointment. <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/tax-guide?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Check out our guide</a>, then get 'em done ASAP so the May 17 deadline doesn’t sneak up on you. </p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Name a major world city with a population in the millions. Take one letter in its name and move it two spots earlier in the alphabet. Reading backward, you now have the name of a restaurant chain. What is it?</p>

Amazon ticked higher while union votes were being counted (more on that in just a sec), but its stock has stayed basically flat for the last six style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0\"\u003e\nLABOR \n\u003c/h3\u003e\n\u003ch1 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, style=\"color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;\"\u003e\n\u003cfont color=\"#000000\"\u003e\nAt Halftime, Amazon Up Big on Union\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/08/amazon-leads-union-21-half-votes-counted\" style=\"text-decoration:none;border:none;\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"\"\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"BESSEMER, AL - MARCH 28: An Amazon-sponsored billboard urging employees ...\" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80NjcxL3VuaW9uX3B1c2hfYXRfYW1hem9uX3dhcmUuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=\"\u003e\n\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eElijah Nouvelage/Getty Images\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAs execs at Sears and Barnes \u0026 Noble can tell you, it’s virtually impossible to beat Amazon—and organizers trying to form the company’s first union at a US facility are finding that out. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWith \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-04-08/amazon-union-vote-count-expected-to-start-as-early-as-thursday?sref=KkPzpZvz\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eabout half\u003c/a\u003e the ballots remaining in the closely watched union vote, 1,100 “no”s had been counted compared to 463 “yes”es. Officials stopped counting around 7pm ET last night and will finish today.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eRoughly 55% of the 5,805 eligible voters cast ballots.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eTo win, the union needs more than half of the votes. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eThe backstory\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAs demand for e-commerce skyrocketed during the pandemic, some employees at an Amazon facility in Bessemer, AL, grew fed up with working conditions, and \u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/07/amazon-faces-big-union-test-alabama-warehouse?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003estarted an effort\u003c/a\u003e to join the Retail, Wholesale, and Department Store Union (RWDSU). Some of their specific complaints included:\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eLack of communication between managers and staff; specifically, how disciplinary action is carried out not by people...but by app. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003ePunishments for workers’ failure to maintain six feet of distance, even when there was not enough space for them to do so.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe odds were against organizers from the beginning. Amazon has successfully squashed all unionization attempts in the US so far, and the company applied super aggressive tactics to make sure it didn’t happen in Alabama. Labor organizing across the tech industry has typically been unsuccessful. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eOrganizers did have some \u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2021/03/02/business/amazon-union-bessemer-alabama.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003efriends in high places\u003c/a\u003e. Democrats including President Biden and Sen. Bernie Sanders voiced support, and so did some Republicans, like Sen. Marco Rubio. NFL players and actors took up the cause as a civil rights issue, since most of the workers at the Bessemer facility are Black.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eIt may not end today\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eUnion leaders signaled they’d appeal the vote, citing documents that showed Amazon \u003ca href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/technology/2021/04/08/amazon-bessemer-mailbox-union/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003epressured\u003c/a\u003e the Postal Service to install a mailbox right outside the facility, which may have intimidated workers when they cast their vote. “We will be calling on the labor board to hold Amazon accountable for its illegal and egregious behavior during the campaign,” said RWDSU President Stuart Appelbaum. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003ea legal battle could push off a conclusive result for weeks. But for now, it appears as though Amazon may have dodged a labor organizing threat that would have rippled across the e-commerce industry. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eCrack down on \"ghost guns,\" or guns that come in kits and can evade law enforcement because they don't have serial numbers.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eSubject firearms that utilize stabilizing braces, which effectively turn pistols into short-barreled rifles, to more regulation.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eDirect the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms, and Explosives to release an annual report on firearms trafficking.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBut as executive orders, not actual laws, these moves are more a tremor than an earthquake. Biden would like to see far more gun control legislation, including a ban on assault weapons and the \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/04/08/biden-calls-for-allowing-lawsuits-against-gun-makers-for-shootings.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003elifting\u003c/a\u003e of legal immunity for firearms manufacturers, but he won't get very far without support from Republicans in Congress...which he doesn't have. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe last week had more twists and turns for cruise operators than Carnival's Dr. Suess waterslide. On Friday, the CDC released new guidelines to resume passenger operations...but stopped short of a date. Following industry outcry, it relented and said maybe mid-summer. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eCruises still feel put out.\u003c/strong\u003e Having watched flight and hotel bookings soar in recent months, cruise lines \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/cruise-industry-spars-with-cdc-as-it-seeks-to-restart-by-summer-11617813616?mod=business_lead_pos2\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ewant the same treatment\u003c/a\u003e as other travel sectors (the CDC \u003cem\u003edid\u003c/em\u003e say travel is low-risk for fully vaccinated people). \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eRoyal Caribbean, Carnival, Disney, and Norwegian have had to \u003ca href=\"https://thepointsguy.com/news/royal-caribbean-celebrity-cruise-cancellations-june/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ecancel trips\u003c/a\u003e through June, and yesterday, Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis announced he's suing the federal government to let passengers aboard. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBut to bring customers back, per CDC rules, cruise lines will have to... \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eRun simulated voyages to rehearse safety procedures.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eRecommend vaccinations for everyone. Norwegian, the first major US cruise line to publish reopening plans, \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2021/04/06/business/norwegian-cruise-line-resumption-plans-cdc/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esaid\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e it will \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cem\u003erequire\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e them. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out:\u003c/strong\u003e Several operators have resumed sailings out of the Caribbean and the Mediterranean, but following a year of standstills, they're desperate to get more ships out to sea.
